ID: 15951
Title: MySQL 5.7 Enhanced Multi-Threaded Slave cause .metadata growing rapidly
Description:
I found MySQL slave has much delay so I enabled Enhanced Multi-Threaded Slave on MySQL slave, then I found the .metadata in each Clichouse DB growing rapidly, content is as below:

```
[root@bdc-clickhouse license_monitor]# cat .metadata
Version:        2
Binlog File:    mysql-bin.000040
Executed GTID:  110a53f9-de98-11e9-bf81-00505696d56b:1-79418278,8ff4fda6-df42-11e9
be2a-0050569687c9:1-545403746:545403747-545403749:545403750-545403752:545403753-545403758:545403759-545403761
545403762-545403764:545403765-545403767:545403768-545403770:545403771-545403773:545403774-545403790:54540379
-545403797:545403798-545403803:545403804-545403813:545403814-545403819:545403820-545403831:545403832-5454038
0:545403841-545403844:545403845-545403852:545403853-545403858:545403859-545403875:545403876-545403882:5454038
3-545403888:545403889:545403890-545403902:545403903:545403904-545403926:545403927-545403947:545403948-5454039
2:545403983-545403992:545403993-545403997:545403998-545404002:545404003-545404009:545404010-545404028:5454040
9-545404068:545404069-545404086:545404087-545404105:545404106-545404132:545404133-545404148:545404149-545404
06:545404207-545404232:545404233-545404263:545404264-545404298:545404299-545404302:545404303-545404370:545404
71-545404379:545404380-545404393:545404394-545404401:545404402-545404427:545404428-545404432:545404433-54540
437:545404438-545404447:545404448-545404487:545404488-545404494:545404495-545404597:545404598-545404635:54540
636:545404637-545404647:545404648-545404654:545404655:545404656-545404676:545404677-545404687:545404688-54540
701:545404702:545404703-545404707:545404708-545404713:545404714-545404771:545404772-545404779:545404780-54540
7
```
